translation.en: Sorry, Big! Sorry, Froggy! Can’t chat-- gotta go help our friends!
translation.es: Perdón, Big y Froggy. Debo ayudar a los chicos.

translation.en: - No problem, Sonic! - Ribbit!
Home is where your friends are, as they say,
translation.es: Dicen que el hogar es donde están tus amigos.

translation.en: and that’s Green Hill,
where the best beaches, palm trees, and chili dogs are just the tip of the iceberg.
translation.es: donde tenemos las mejores playas, palmeras y hot dogs con chile.

translation.en: We’ve saved this place a million times from this doofus.
translation.es: Salvamos mil veces este lugar de este tonto.

translation.en: And then there’s Shadow.
It’s complicated. More on him later.
The fact is, we never lose.
’Cause when you’ve got a crew like mine, there’s nothing that can stop you!
translation.es: Con un equipo como el mío, nada puede detenerte.

translation.en: Hey, guys! I made it!
You’re late!
Sonic!
Eggman!
Just in time to watch me claim the Paradox Prism
translation.es: Llegas para verme tomar el Prisma Paradoja

translation.en: and transform your disgustingly green world
into something more... me.
translation.es: en algo más… a mi estilo.

translation.en: Yawn!
Yep, I yawned you, Eggman.
Crush them all!
- Sonic! - Yo, Tails!
Knuckles! You okay, buddy?
Nothing flusters me, Sonic...
except when you’re late.
Thanks, Rouge!
Don’t mention it. Literally.
Amy! Sonic! Where have you been?
Got a little sidetracked.
Get that rock out of the ground!
Want something done, do it yourself.
Sonic, we don’t know what the Prism
translation.es: No sabemos de qué es capaz el Prisma.

translation.en: is capable of. Be careful.
translation.es: No sabemos de qué es capaz el Prisma. Ten cuidado.

translation.en: If Eggman wants it, it can’t be good.
translation.es: Si él lo quiere, debe ser peligroso.

translation.en: Got it!
Step away from the rock, Eggman.
Not this time, you fool.
Sonic, wait!
Sonic, no!
One day I’ll destroy that hedgehog,
translation.es: Un día destruiré a ese erizo,

translation.en: and the world will be a brighter place for it,
translation.es: y el mundo se volverá más brillante.

translation.en: lit by neon.
As long as I’m around, you’ll always have a wingman!
The forest is the most beautiful place on earth.
translation.es: El bosque es lo más bello de la Tierra.

translation.en: I don’t need the details, just tell me who to smash.
translation.es: No me expliques, solo dime a quién golpear.

translation.en: You may not like the way I do things, but I get things done!
translation.es: Tal vez no te guste cómo, pero obtengo resultados.

translation.en: Hey, I may be the one who can bring everyone together,
translation.es: Tal vez yo sea la que puede unirnos a todos,

translation.en: but there’s only one hedgehog they’ll follow into battle.
translation.es: pero solo te seguirán a ti a la batalla.

translation.en: Heh heh! I don’t need an army when I’ve got a friend like you, Sonic.
translation.es: No necesito un ejército con un amigo como tú, Sonic.

translation.en: I will rule the world, and no rodents are going to stop me.
translation.es: Gobernaré el mundo, y ningún roedor me va a detener.

translation.en: We’d follow you anywhere, Sonic.
translation.es: Te seguiremos a donde sea, Sonic.

translation.en: Nothing could break our friendship, Sonic.
That’s a sonic boom of a headache.
Wh- where am I? Huh?
Aah! Close one.
Why can’t I remember how I got here?
Think, Sonic, think!
Whoa, what is up with my shoes?
Huh. I haven’t seen anything like this since I ate truck stop chili dogs.
translation.es: No veo algo así desde que comí algo raro.

translation.en: Tails? Amy?
Heck, I’ll even take Knuckles at this point.
Uh, pardon me, what do you call this place?
Are you ignoring me? You’re ignoring me.
Why are you ignoring me? Why is everyone ignoring me?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me ignoras? ¿Por qué todos me ignoran?

translation.en: Can anybody give me a straight answer around here?
And you’re busy staring at nothing. Okay.
translation.es: Estás ocupado mirando a la nada. De acuerdo.

translation.en: Welcome to New Yoke City. You’re welcome.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a la Ciudad de Nueva Yugork.

translation.en: Never heard of it. Has to be far from home.
translation.es: No la conozco. Debe ser lejos de casa.

translation.en: Where are the mountains, the beaches, the palm trees?
translation.es: ¿Dónde están las montañas, las playas, las palmeras?

translation.en: Big! Froggy!
Am I glad to see familiar faces!
I thought I was losing my rings, you know what I mean?
What is going on here? Are you wearing pants?
Unidentified citizen.
Alert! Alert!
Big! Don’t go!
You are in violation of city ordinance 27 B/6.
translation.es: Está violando el decreto 27 B/6 de la ciudad.

translation.en: Sorry, I don’t speak robot.
By the authority of the Chaos Council, stand down or be disassembled.
translation.es: El Consejo del Caos le ordena rendirse si no quiere ser eliminado.

translation.en: Chaos Council. Sounds important. Give me directions, and I’ll take it from there.
translation.es: ¿Consejo del Caos? Suena importante. Indícame cómo ir.

translation.en: Whoa! What’s up with my shoes?
Ugh! I’m not used to all these walls.
And where are my rings?
Robots without Flickies? Now, that’s new.
translation.es: ¿Robots sin Flickies? Eso sí es nuevo.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no!
This is not working. I gotta get off the ground!
translation.es: Esto no funciona. Debo abandonar el suelo.

translation.en: Smog, concrete, evil robots.
It’s like everything I hate all in one place!
translation.es: Todo lo que odio en un solo lugar.

translation.en: Where am I?
Oh, no!
Please be wrong. Please be wrong!
The Loop- de- Loop...
Hedgehog’s Pass...
and that should be Tails’ lab!
Aw, Tails, what happened?
Come on, Egghead, show me what you got!
That’s the spirit, rodent-- the spirit of a loser!
translation.es: ¡Esa es la actitud, roedor! ¡La actitud de un perdedor!

translation.en: Takes one to know one. Ha!
Why do I feel like Eggman’s keeping us off the main stage?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siento que Eggman nos está distrayendo?

translation.en: Eggman’s got us fighting the badniks so he can have Sonic all to himself.
translation.es: Nos tiene peleando aquí para enfrentarse a Sonic solo.

translation.en: Let’s go crash his show!
One scrambled egg, coming up.
Hmm. I don’t like this.
Dr. Eggman’s too smart not to realize how terribly positioned he is.
translation.es: El Dr. Eggman es listo. Debe saber que su posición es terrible.

translation.en: It’s almost like he’s--
He’s not in there.
Quaking in your tiny shoes at the might of my Eggcrusher?
translation.es: ¿Tiemblas en tus zapatitos ante mi poder?

translation.en: It’s understandable. I’m rather astounding.
In your dreams! You bring it, I break it, Eggman.
translation.es: En tus sueños. Tú apareces, yo te derroto.

translation.en: That’s the game, and I’m still the undefeated numero uno.
translation.es: Es el juego, y sigo siendo el invicto número uno.

translation.en: Then put your quills where your mouth is,
unless you’re scared!
It’s a trap, Sonic! It’s a trap!
I don’t see a trap, though I guess by definition I wouldn’t see a trap if there was one.
translation.es: No veo ninguna trampa, aunque es la idea de las trampas.

translation.en: Something funny, egghead?
You are! Watching you try to think
translation.es: ¡Tú! ¡Verte tratar de pensar con ese cerebrito es muy gracioso!

translation.en: with that two- cent brain of yours is hilarious!
translation.es: ¡Verte tratar de pensar con ese cerebrito es muy gracioso!

translation.en: Sonic! You gotta listen! It’s a trap!
You’re as stupid as your mutant, two- tailed fox friend is ugly.
translation.es: Eres tan tonto como tu amigo zorro mutante de dos colas es feo.

translation.en: Oh, you’re really asking for it.
translation.es: En serio te la estás buscando.

translation.en: Yes... I am!
You can mess with me, Eggman, but no one messes with my best friend.
translation.es: Puedes meterte conmigo, pero nadie se mete con mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: Sonic! No!
Whoa! Didn’t know I had that in me.
translation.es: No sabía que tenía ese poder.

translation.en: That’s what you get for messing with my friends, Egghead!
translation.es: Eso te ganas por meterte con mis amigos.

translation.en: Huh? Wh- where’s Eggman?
He must have ejected.
Well, looks like we win again.
Tails! He’s not even in here. Lame, right?
Too chicken to face us in person. Whatevs!
translation.es: Muy cobarde para enfrentarnos. Da igual. ¡Me ayudaste mucho!

translation.en: Couldn’t have done it without ya, buddy!
Whoa, Tails looks upset.
And Tails never gets upset.
It worked!
Without the power of that blue buffoon, we would have had to dig for months.
translation.es: Sin su poder, habríamos tenido que excavar meses.

translation.en: Thank you for the earthquake, Sonic,
and thank me for my plan, which went off spectacularly.
translation.es: Y gracias a mí por pensar ese plan, que salió espectacularmente.

translation.en: And it worked, too!
Of course it worked! I just said that!
Ugh, let’s go. Papa wants his Prism.
Yo! How’s my genius friend?
Hey, Sonic.
I brought you some comics.
Thanks, Sonic, you can put them over there.
How about a little break from the big brain stuff?
I can’t. Something’s not right. I gotta figure out what Eggman is up to.
translation.es: No puedo. Algo anda mal. Debo averiguar qué trama Eggman.

translation.en: Sorry, Tails. I didn’t mean to upset you.
In fact, I’ve never seen you so upset.
I just kinda got into the moment and...
Sonic, it’s cool. Really.
But thanks. I appreciate it.
Don’t you think it was weird that Eggman wasn’t in the Eggcrusher?
translation.es: ¿No te pareció raro que Eggman no estuviera?

translation.en: Uh, not really. I mean, he is a total chicken.
translation.es: No tanto. Es un cobarde total.

translation.en: But I did find a hunk of junk in the cockpit where his big butt shoulda been.
translation.es: Pero encontré mucha chatarra en la cabina donde se sienta.

translation.en: Hunk of junk, huh? Wonder if that was all part of the trap?
translation.es: ¿Chatarra? Me pregunto si eso era parte de la trampa.

translation.en: Tell me you didn’t toss it in the barge of badnik parts.
translation.es: ¿La tiraste con las partes de Badniks?

translation.en: Junk speedy delivery! You smash it, we dash it!
Whoa, lemme see that!
It wasn’t a trap, it was a trick.
translation.es: No era una trampa. Era un truco.

translation.en: You’ve never created a blast that destructive.
I think that this device was some sort of speed amplifier.
Long story short, he used your speed against you!
translation.es: En resumen, usó tu velocidad en tu contra.

translation.en: - The fox is on to something. - Huh?
Rouge?
How did you get in here? He played you for a fool, Blue.
Pfft! Please!
What would he need a massive explosion in that area for?
Well... I have a hunch.
You see, I’ve been searching for years
for a super rare and shiny gem called the Paradox Prism.
translation.es: una gema muy especial llamada Prisma Paradoja.

translation.en: Paradox Prism?
Legend speaks of untold power,
translation.es: Dicen que tiene un gran poder,

translation.en: and it’s buried deep within the Green Hill bedrock.
translation.es: y está enterrado en Green Hill.

translation.en: My guess is that he used your power against you to try to find it.
translation.es: Creo que utilizó tu poder para tratar de encontrarla.

translation.en: Fascinating.
translation.es: Creo que utilizó tu poder para tratar de encontrarla. Fascinante.

translation.en: But what I really want to know is, how did you get in here?
translation.es: Pero lo que quiero saber es: ¿cómo entraste aquí?

translation.en: You left the door open.
Gather your crew and meet me at the top of the loop- de- loop.
translation.es: Los veré en la cima del loop-de-loop.

translation.en: Let’s find out what Eggman is up to.
At last. The Paradox Prism!
So close. It was only a rumor for so long,
translation.es: ¡Tan cerca! Por mucho tiempo fue solo un rumor,

translation.en: and now inches from my grasp.
translation.es: Por mucho tiempo fue solo un rumor, ¡pero ya casi lo tengo!

translation.en: Countless times I have tried to modernize this hunk of earth
translation.es: Tantas veces intenté modernizar este pedazo de Tierra,

translation.en: only to be defied by that simpleton Sonic.
translation.es: solo para que ese bobo de Sonic lo impidiera.

translation.en: Now, it’s finally going to happen.
And it’s all the sweeter because the blue baboon handed me this prize...
translation.es: Y es aún más dulce porque el bufón azul me entregó el premio.

translation.en: without realizing it.
So, thank you, Sonic.
For now, I stand at the summit of--
translation.es: Porque ahora estoy en la cima de…

translation.en: Of the mountain.
...of a new age! The age of--
translation.es: De una nueva era. La era de…

translation.en: Pretty lights?
...the age of the Eggman Empire!
Ooh! Fancy.
And now...
Why didn’t you idiots tell me how big that first step was?
translation.es: Idiotas, no me dijeron que el primer escalón era tan alto.

translation.en: Sorry, Boss.
Where is it?
I know you’re here somewhere.
translation.es: Sé que estás por aquí en algún lugar.

translation.en: I think Rouge is right.
Eggman picked that spot for a reason.
Why else would he hide a power amplifier in his own egg crusher?
So we start at the scene of the crime.
translation.es: Empecemos en la escena del crimen.

translation.en: Exactly. Let’s go investigate and see if anything
translation.es: Exacto. Vayamos a investigar y ver si algo nos lleva al Prisma del que hablan.

translation.en: might lead us to this Paradox Prism you guys are talking about.
translation.es: Vayamos a investigar y ver si algo nos lleva al Prisma del que hablan.

translation.en: Paradox Prism. Right.
That’s what Eggman was after.
How?
No, no, no. I didn’t leave Green Hill.
translation.es: No, no. No me fui de Green Hill.

translation.en: This is Green Hill.
He did it.
I don’t know how he did it, but he did it.
translation.es: No sé cómo lo hizo, pero lo hizo.

translation.en: Eggman won.
That would mean... badniks.
I gotta find Tails!
Badniks. I gotta find Tails.
Who are you?
More ungrateful rebels.
No. Something new. Not in the databanks.
translation.es: No. Algo nuevo. No está en la base de datos.

translation.en: Its energy profile is... intriguing.
translation.es: Su perfil de energía es llamativo.

translation.en: The Unidentified Running Organism has outrun the Eggforcers
translation.es: El organismo corredor le ganó a los Egg Forcers

translation.en: and is heading towards Babble’s area.
translation.es: y se dirige al área de Babble.

translation.en: Finding Tails would be a lot easier
if everything was covered in grass and palm trees, like it should be.
translation.es: si todo estuviera cubierto de césped y palmeras.

translation.en: Eggman, finally! I don’t know what you did,
translation.es: Eggman, ¡al fin! No sé qué hiciste ni cómo, pero te patearé el trasero.

translation.en: and I don’t know how you did it, but I’m gonna kick your Ro- butt!
translation.es: No sé qué hiciste ni cómo, pero te patearé el trasero.

translation.en: What is that, a baby rattle? Not exactly scary--
Whoa! Come on, shoes!
Okay, Eggy, you tell me what you did and how to fix it!
translation.es: Bien, Eggy, ¡dime qué hiciste y cómo arreglarlo!

translation.en: Whoa! You really are a baby.
What in the name of Green Hill’s going on?
Ugh! Sorry, kid, I don’t bust up babies.
Go home, change your diaper, think about your choices,
translation.es: Ve a cambiarte el pañal y reflexionar.

translation.en: and tell Eggman I’ll deal with him later.
Right now, I got a fox friend to find!
translation.es: Ahora debo encontrar a mi amigo.

translation.en: He’s fast, powerful, and hates the egg.
translation.es: Es veloz, poderoso, y odia a Eggman.

translation.en: We gotta follow this guy.
I don’t know, Rebel. What if we follow him
translation.es: No lo sé, Rebelde. ¿Y si nos lleva directo al Consejo del Caos?

translation.en: right into the hands of the Chaos Council?
translation.es: ¿Y si nos lleva directo al Consejo del Caos?

translation.en: Feels like a trap.
When have I ever steered us wrong?
Rhetorical question.
Departing trainsport from Circle Station arriving in the scareport...
translation.es: Saliendo de Estación Círculo con destino a Sustopuerto.

translation.en: Oh, man, I could really use a familiar face right about now.
translation.es: Vaya, me vendría bien una cara conocida ahora.

translation.en: Tails? Buddy?
Tails! Tails!
Wait, what?
Huh! I knew you were here somewhere.
translation.es: Sabía que estabas en algún lado.

translation.en: Please be the same.
Tails, you crafty fox.
Finally something around here makes sense.
Weird.
Nothing about this is like Tails’ workshop.
translation.es: No se parece nada al taller de Tails.

translation.en: Yes! There’s my two- tailed genius friend.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Ahí está mi amigo genio de dos colas.

translation.en: Surprise!
Tails! It’s me, your best, uh...
What did you just call me?
Uh... Tails?
The name’s...  Nine!
What do you want?
Who sent you?
How many tails do you have?
Nine!
Tails, stop!
We’re buds! Amigos!
Best friends!
I have no friends!
No friends? You have the best friends.
Target located. We’re at the Scareport.
Loud and clear. On our way.
You’ve been working out? Who’s your trainer?
Ow!
I was trained by the misery of life and this foul and heartless city.
translation.es: Me entrenó la vida cruel en esta ciudad horrible y triste.

translation.en: Snap out of it! We go way back.
All my best memories of Green Hill have you in ’em,
translation.es: Estás en todos mis mejores recuerdos.

translation.en: and you’re not punching me.
Don’t you want to go home?
Blue skies, sunny beaches, palm trees?
I don’t know what kind of mind games you’re playing, but it won’t work!
translation.es: No sé qué es este juego mental, pero no funciona.

translation.en: You saved me?
I’ve been trying to tell you that we are friends.
translation.es: Te estoy diciendo que somos amigos.

translation.en: Fabricated stories won’t keep me from beating you back, intruder!
translation.es: Tus inventos no evitarán que te golpee, intruso.

translation.en: Stop. Just stop.
We’re friends. Best friends.
This has to ring a bell.
From the very moment we first met,
you were a happy, brainy little fox
translation.es: eras un zorro astuto y feliz

translation.en: doing happy, brainy little fox things.
translation.es: haciendo cosas de zorro astuto y feliz.

translation.en: Some blockhead bullies were picking on you for having an extra tail.
translation.es: Unos tontos te estaban molestando por tener una cola extra.

translation.en: I ran by, and they lost interest in being jerks.
translation.es: Pasé corriendo y cambiaron su actitud.

translation.en: How do you know about that?
That’s not how it happened...
and you weren’t there.
I was a kid, minding my business but not minding my surroundings.
translation.es: Yo era un niño y no prestaba mucha atención a mi alrededor.

translation.en: Some creeps came along and picked on me for having one extra tail.
translation.es: Unos matones me atacaron por tener una cola extra.

translation.en: I took a beating.
It was the same for years,
until I used my cunning fox brain to give me a real way to fight back.
translation.es: Hasta que usé mi cerebro de zorro astuto para darme una ventaja.

translation.en: I take care of myself and need no one. Period.
translation.es: Me cuido solo y no necesito a nadie. Punto.

translation.en: No one has friends here.
Why do you think I live down here?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que vivo aquí abajo?

translation.en: To avoid everyone...
you included.
Doesn’t make sense.
You are Tails, but you’re not.
translation.es: Eres Tails, pero, a la vez, no lo eres.

translation.en: Here, but gone?
So-- so what else did we do?
Well, first of all, you have the coolest plane.
translation.es: Bueno, antes que nada, tú tienes un avión genial.

translation.en: I do?
It’s called the Tornado.
And we fought and busted Eggman like, so many times, I’ve lost track.
translation.es: Vencimos a Eggman tantísimas veces, que perdí la cuenta.

translation.en: You mean the Chaos Council?
No, I mean Eggman.
So, Mr. Doctor Eggman, then?
Sure. Sounds good.
Look, we’ve had our share of ups and downs,
translation.es: Mira. Tuvimos altibajos, pero cuando estábamos juntos,

translation.en: but when we stick together, we never lose.
translation.es: Tuvimos altibajos, pero cuando estábamos juntos, nunca perdíamos.

translation.en: And when all’s said and done, there’s no better reward
translation.es: Y, al final, no hay mejor recompensa

translation.en: than sharing a chili dog with your best pal.
translation.es: que compartir un hot dog con tu amigo.

translation.en: And that’s just the tip of the iceberg.
translation.es: Y eso es solo una partecita.

translation.en: We’ve got a lifetime of adventures and memories together.
translation.es: Tenemos miles de aventuras y recuerdos.

translation.en: Um, I-- I think your shoes are smoldering.
translation.es: Creo que tus zapatos están ardiendo.

translation.en: Of course they are.
What else can go wrong in this crazy place?
translation.es: ¿Qué más puede salir mal en este lugar?

translation.en: The only thing I despise more than people in my space is whiners.
translation.es: Una de las cosas que más odio es a los quejosos.

translation.en: Wait! I thought we just had a bonding moment.
Stay still.
Curious. There’s low- level energy
translation.es: Qué curioso. La energía en todo tu cuerpo es baja.

translation.en: throughout your entire body.
translation.es: La energía en todo tu cuerpo es baja.

translation.en: But possibly a regulator could...
Follow me!
I, uh, like them, by the way.
Those ratty old sneakers? Obviously.
No. I mean, I always thought your extra tail was cool,
translation.es: No. Siempre me gustó tu cola extra,

translation.en: but the metal ones? Man, you’re amazing.
Uh, sure. One last touch.
Attach these.
They might be able to regulate the excess energy coming off your gear so they don’t explode.
translation.es: Quizá regulen la energía extra, para que no exploten.

translation.en: Might?
This energy is still a mystery.
Whoa! What are these?
No, energy overflow and the look. I mean, come on. Mwah!
translation.es: No desborda la energía y me veo espectacular.

translation.en: Ah, curious. They’re still your gloves and shoes,
translation.es: Qué curioso. Son tus guantes y zapatos,

translation.en: only now they seem to have attuned with the energy
translation.es: pero se sintonizaron con tu energía corporal

translation.en: in your body instead of resisting it.
translation.es: pero se sintonizaron con tu energía corporal en vez de resistirse a ella. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: I wonder why that is.
translation.es: en vez de resistirse a ella. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Oh- ho, these are killer! No more slipping and sliding, no smoke.
translation.es: ¡Son lo máximo! No me resbalo ni sale humo.

translation.en: Thanks, Tails. I mean, Nine. Time for a test drive.
translation.es: Gracias, Tails. Digo, Nine. Voy a probarlas.

translation.en: No, wait, you dope! It’s not safe.
Hey, if the mad scientist- slash- loner thing doesn’t work out, you should get into fashion accessories.
translation.es: Si lo de científico solitario no te funciona, dedícate a la moda.

translation.en: Stylin’!
Shh! We need to maintain a low profile.
The Council has eyes everywhere.
When you get your memory back,
translation.es: Ya recordarás que mantener un perfil bajo

translation.en: you’ll remember that low profile isn’t my thing.
translation.es: Ya recordarás que mantener un perfil bajo no es lo mío.

translation.en: - Want to run up the walls? - What? No.
Not the baby.
I told you to keep a low profile.
No, you didn’t.
- Yes, I did. - You didn’t.
translation.es: - No me dijiste. - Sí. - No. - Sí te dije.

translation.en: - Yes, I did. - No, you didn’t.
translation.es: - No. - Sí te dije. No me dijiste.

translation.en: Are you sure we were best friends?
- Blue Streak has a friend? - Didn’t look friendly.
translation.es: ¿El erizo tiene amigos? No parecía amistoso.

translation.en: But whoever he is, he’s involved now.
translation.es: Sea quien sea, ahora está involucrado.

translation.en: Who’s there? Hello?
Hello?
Ow! A little warning. Man, that’s bright.
Hello? Tissue?
You’re wasting your breath.
Nine, is that you?
Are you the small blurry thing or the medium blurry thing?
translation.es: ¿Eres la cosa borrosa pequeña o mediana?

translation.en: Or the big blurry--
Amy?!
Amy! All right. Now we’re getting somewhere.
- Got a key? - Negative.
translation.es: ¡Amy! Ahora sí. ¿Tienes una llave? Negativo. Mi identificación es Rose Oxidada.

translation.en: My identification is Rusty Rose.
translation.es: Negativo. Mi identificación es Rose Oxidada.

translation.en: You’re a robot!
No. Mechanically enhanced.
Survival required adaptation, as you will soon learn.
translation.es: Adaptación para sobrevivir. Ya lo descubrirás.

translation.en: - Oh, Amy. - Rusty Rose. Cease talking.
translation.es: Ay, Amy… Rose Oxidada. No hables.

translation.en: You will need all the breath you can muster if you are to survive.
translation.es: Necesitas ahorrar aire si quieres sobrevivir.

translation.en: More silhouettes? Who does your lighting?
The Chaos Council.
Dr. Done- It.
I’m awake. I’m awake. Go on. You were saying.
Dr. Deep.
The philosophical ramifications
translation.es: Las ramificaciones filosóficas de este descubrimiento

translation.en: of this discovery rock my very core.
translation.es: Las ramificaciones filosóficas de este descubrimiento me emocionan profundamente.

translation.en: Dr. Don’t.
Whatevs.
And you have already met the baby, Dr. Babble.
translation.es: Y ya conociste al bebé, Dr. Babble.

translation.en: That is the angriest baby I’ve ever met.
translation.es: El bebé más enojón del mundo.

translation.en: And finally, Mr. Doctor Eggman.
translation.es: Y, por último, Mr. Dr. Eggman.

translation.en: Oh, so that’s who you were talking about!
By the dumbfounded look in your eyes,
I gather you’ve come to grips with the gravity of your situation.
translation.es: asumo que comprendes la gravedad de tu situación.

translation.en: The Council? Looks like an Eggman family reunion.
translation.es: ¿El Consejo? Parece una reunión familiar Eggman.

translation.en: When did you call in reinforcements, Eggy?
We are not a family, rodent.
We are The Council. One makes five.
translation.es: Somos el Consejo. Uno hace cinco, cinco hacen uno.

translation.en: Five makes one.
translation.es: Uno hace cinco, cinco hacen uno.

translation.en: So many Eggmans, so many questions.
Does anyone have an aspirin?
How could you not know?!
We’re famous.
We are what we are.
Always have been, always will be.
translation.es: Siempre lo hemos sido, siempre lo seremos.

translation.en: So this creature made all that fuss?
Doesn’t look like much to me.
translation.es: A mí no me parece la gran cosa.

translation.en: Hey, I respect creaky old stuff, but poke me again,
translation.es: ¡Oye! Yo respeto las cosas viejas, pero pégame de nuevo y te aniquilo, abuelo.

translation.en: and I’ll crack your antique shell, Egg- gramps.
translation.es: pero pégame de nuevo y te aniquilo, abuelo.

translation.en: - - I told you. It seems to know who we are,
translation.es: Les dije. La cosa sabe quiénes somos.

translation.en: yet we have no information on it in our databanks.
translation.es: Pero no aparece en la base de datos.

translation.en: It? Really?
Like it popped into existence from nowhere.
translation.es: Es como si hubiera aparecido de la nada.

translation.en: What? I’ve been here the whole time, dude.
translation.es: ¿Qué? He estado aquí todo el tiempo, amigo.

translation.en: Perhaps answers lie in the energy signature - the creature exhibits. -
translation.es: Tal vez las respuestas estén en la energía de la criatura.

translation.en: May I suggest a series of grueling life- endangering diagnostic tests?
translation.es: Sugiero pruebas de diagnóstico crueles y peligrosas.

translation.en: Not helping, Amy. You know I don’t do well on tests.
translation.es: Vamos, Amy. No me va bien en las pruebas.

translation.en: Those in favor of stress- testing this blue rabbit, say yes.
translation.es: ¿A favor de hacerle pruebas de estrés al conejo azul?

translation.en: - - Oh, yes, please.
Hey, hey!
Rusty, put him through the paces.
Let’s see how powerful he is.
Do not fight them. It will only end badly for him.
translation.es: No te resistas. O todo terminará mal. Para él.

translation.en: - - Nine!
Okay, let’s start the test. The sooner we do this,
translation.es: Empecemos la prueba, así Nine y yo podemos irnos de una vez.

translation.en: the sooner Nine and I can get out of here.
translation.es: así Nine y yo podemos irnos de una vez.

translation.en: Lasers. I hate lasers.
- - Nice!
Seriously? A hamster ball? What is wrong with you people?
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¿Una bola para hámster? ¿Qué les pasa?

translation.en: The tests are still inconclusive.
His maximum limits remain unknown.
Make the blue badger run.
translation.es: Haz que la comadreja azul corra.

translation.en: - - Come on, Amy! Some compassion for your boy Sonic!
translation.es: Vamos, Amy. Ten compasión por tu amigo Sonic.

translation.en: You can’t suddenly be this heartless.
translation.es: No puedes ser cruel de pronto.

translation.en: Birdie would disagree.
That’s so messed up.
Sonic!
You want to test me, Eggheads?
Question: How do you tick off a hedgehog?
Answer: Mess with his friends.
I totally call dibs on his quills.
translation.es: Yo quiero quedarme con sus púas.

translation.en: I knew it. He’s got the same energy that powers the city.
translation.es: Lo sabía. Su energía es como la que alimenta la ciudad.

translation.en: The energy field is supercharging our systems.
translation.es: Su energía está sobrecargando los sistemas.

translation.en: Turns out the blue possum has some juice after all.
translation.es: Resulta que la comadreja azul tiene poder.

translation.en: Sonic, it’s broken! It’s all broken!
Shadow?! Uh- oh, I think I’m starting to hallucinate.
Let’s stick together and we’ll--
Perfect! I’m gonna ring up. Meet you there.
translation.es: Voy a buscar rings. ¡Los veo allá!

translation.en: Sonic!
I guess he didn’t hear the stick together part.
translation.es: Supongo que no escuchó lo que dije.

translation.en: - Does he ever? - No.
But he also hasn’t let us down when it really counts.
translation.es: Pero nunca nos falla cuando lo necesitamos.

translation.en: You know Sonic. He’ll catch up at some point.
Wow! Are you guys seeing this?
Look at the fault line. It goes right up the mountain.
translation.es: ¡Miren la fractura! Sube por la montaña.

translation.en: Anyone noticing that?
That cloud hasn’t moved an inch.
translation.es: La nube no se movió para nada.

translation.en: Something’s unnatural. Tails!
Already on it.
Whoa. Do you think Sonic’s in there?
With all those badniks still standing?
Our pal’s not exactly the stealthy type.
We got here before him? How?
Find a spot to land.
Let’s find out what’s going on.
We can wrap this up before dinner.
translation.es: Seguro terminamos antes de la cena.

translation.en: Mmm. Chili dogs.
But first, just in case Eggman gets in a lucky shot, Rings!
translation.es: Pero por si Eggman tiene un golpe de suerte, ¡rings!
